resources.string:
I fine Thank you and how about you?
 A -> I think I need to go to the toilet.
 B -> Then go, what are you waiting for?
 A -> I don't have any bucks. 
 B -> Ohh, wait! Let me find. OK, here you go.
 A-> Thank you so much man, I will give you back tomorrow.
 B-> Ahh no need man, it's just ten bucks.
